name: Carrot Overload
storyline:
humanity is stopped,they lost,their dreams and their hopes,
between the walls of their cities that protect them from monsters.
in this world there is no hero, if humans are victims, that's even more
the case for animals and terrible for the smallest one.
but a rabbit may bring the change we all need,
we have the ability to fight in the goal to protect.
pawns up,it is time for the show !
summary:
Carrot overload is a turn based- simplified rpg and the player control a rabbit
this game is playable with a controler and contain a lot of colorful dungeon.
it is a cute game where player collect carrots to progress in the dungeon,
but many enemies await this adorable rabbit.
